channel.title: Stuck at 'requesting title screen' Please help
channel.description:
[i][b]Rep++ for anyone who can help me. 9/10 clients I download starts to load, then gets stuck at 'Requesting title screens' then comes up with 'Connection error - Retrying in 5', then retries in 5 seconds, then changes to 'Connection error - Retrying in 10' and just keeps going up.. Please Could someone help me!!! [/b][/i]
FIXED, WAS A SPELLING MISTAKE HAHA
